verses.verse: <S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G3991>fifth<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G4537>sounded<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> a <S%G792>star<s%> <S%G4098>fall<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%> was <S%G1325>given<s%> the <S%G2807>key<s%> of the <S%G12>bottomless<s%> <S%G5421>pit<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G455>opened<s%> the <S%G12>bottomless<s%> <S%G5421>pit<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> there <S%G305>arose<s%> a <S%G2586>smoke<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G5421>pit<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G2586>smoke<s%> of a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2575>furnace<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2246>sun<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G109>air<s%> were <S%G4654>darkened<s%> by reason <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G2586>smoke<s%> of the <S%G5421>pit<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> there <S%G1831>came<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G2586>smoke<s%> <S%G200>locusts<s%> <S%G1519>upon<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%> was <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G4651>scorpions<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> it was <S%G4483>commanded<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3363>that<s%> they <S%G91>should<s%> <S%G3363>not<s%> <S%G91>hurt<s%> the <S%G5528>grass<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%>, <S%G3761>neither<s%> <S%G3956>any<s%> green <S%G5515>thing<s%>, <S%G3761>neither<s%> <S%G3956>any<s%> <S%G1186>tree<s%>; <S%G1508>but<s%> <S%G3441>only<s%> those <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G4973>seal<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3359>foreheads<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> to <S%G846>them<s%> it was <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G3363>that<s%> they <S%G615>should<s%> <S%G3363>not<s%> <S%G615>kill<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they should be <S%G928>tormented<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G3376>months<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G929>torment<s%> was <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G929>torment<s%> of a <S%G4651>scorpion<s%>, <S%G3752>when<s%> he <S%G3817>striketh<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> shall <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G2212>seek<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2147>shall<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G846>it<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> shall <S%G1937>desire<s%> to <S%G599>die<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> shall <S%G5343>flee<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G3667>shapes<s%> of the <S%G200>locusts<s%> were <S%G3664>like<s%> unto <S%G2462>horses<s%> <S%G2090>prepared<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G4171>battle<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2776>heads<s%> were as it <S%G5613>were<s%> <S%G4735>crowns<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> <S%G5557>gold<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4383>faces<s%> were <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G4383>faces<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G2359>hair<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G2359>hair<s%> of <S%G1135>women<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3599>teeth<s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> the teeth of <S%G3023>lions<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G2382>breastplates<s%>, as it <S%G5613>were<s%> <S%G2382>breastplates<s%> of <S%G4603>iron<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5456>sound<s%> of <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4420>wings<s%> was <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G5456>sound<s%> of <S%G716>chariots<s%> of <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2462>horses<s%> <S%G5143>running<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G4171>battle<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G3769>tails<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> unto <S%G4651>scorpions<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> there <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G2759>stings<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3769>tails<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> was to <S%G91>hurt<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G3376>months<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G2192>had<s%> a <S%G935>king<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G848>them<s%>, which is the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the bottomless <S%G12>pit<s%>, <S%G846>whose<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> in the Hebrew <S%G1447>tongue<s%> is <S%G3>Abaddon<s%>, <S%G2532>but<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the Greek <S%G1673>tongue<s%> <S%G2192>hath<s%> his <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G623>Apollyon<s%>. Apollyon: that is to say, A destroyer
<S%G3391>One<s%> <S%G3759>woe<s%> is <S%G565>past<s%>; and, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, there <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3759>woes<s%> <S%G2089>more<s%> <S%G3326>hereafter<s%> <S%G5023><s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G1623>sixth<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G4537>sounded<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3391>a<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G2768>horns<s%> of the <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G2379>altar<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>,

<S%G3004>Saying<s%> to the <S%G1623>sixth<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> the <S%G4536>trumpet<s%>, <S%G3089>Loose<s%> the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are <S%G1210>bound<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4215>river<s%> <S%G2166>Euphrates<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> were <S%G3089>loosed<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> were <S%G2090>prepared<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> an <S%G5610>hour<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G2250>day<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G3376>month<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G1763>year<s%>, for <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G615>slay<s%> the third <S%G5154>part<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%>. for an hour: or, at an hour

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G706>number<s%> of the <S%G4753>army<s%> of the <S%G2461>horsemen<s%> were two <S%G1417>hundred<s%> <S%G3461>thousand<s%> <S%G3461>thousand<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%> the <S%G706>number<s%> of <S%G846>them<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3779>thus<s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> the <S%G2462>horses<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3706>vision<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> them that <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G2382>breastplates<s%> of <S%G4447>fire<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G5191>jacinth<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2306>brimstone<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2776>heads<s%> of the <S%G2462>horses<s%> were <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G2776>heads<s%> of <S%G3023>lions<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4750>mouths<s%> <S%G1607>issued<s%> <S%G4442>fire<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2586>smoke<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2303>brimstone<s%>.

<S%G5259>By<s%> <S%G5130>these<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G615>was<s%> the third <S%G5154>part<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G615>killed<s%>, <S%G1537>by<s%> the <S%G4442>fire<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> the <S%G2586>smoke<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> the <S%G2303>brimstone<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G1607>issued<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4750>mouths<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> <S%G1526>is<s%> <S%G2076><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3769>tails<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3769>tails<s%> were <S%G3664>like<s%> unto <S%G3789>serpents<s%>, and <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G2776>heads<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> they do <S%G91>hurt<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G3062>rest<s%> of the <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G615>were<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G615>killed<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G5025>these<s%> <S%G4127>plagues<s%> <S%G3777>yet<s%> <S%G3340>repented<s%> <S%G3777>not<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> of <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%>, <S%G3363>that<s%> they <S%G4352>should<s%> <S%G3363>not<s%> <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G1140>devils<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1497>idols<s%> of <S%G5552>gold<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G693>silver<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5470>brass<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3035>stone<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G3585>wood<s%>: <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G991>see<s%>, <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G191>hear<s%>, <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G4043>walk<s%>:

<S%G2532>Neither<s%> <S%G3756><s%> repented <S%G3340>they<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G5408>murders<s%>, <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G5331>sorceries<s%>, <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4202>fornication<s%>, <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2809>thefts<s%>.
